name: Acceptance criteria - Lots to be broken up accordingly and outlined on a lot map
Acceptance criteria - Submission of Mix Design and compliance certificates for concrete constituents
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Underlying services and/or assets have been installed prior to commencing works over and/or above.
Acceptance criteria - Set out the alignment and level of the kerb
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.3]
Acceptance criteria - Shape and compact foundation material to the requirements of the respective pavement course
Ref docs - Spec. 0319 Minor Concrete Works [Cl 4.8, 4.9, 4.10, 4.11]
Acceptance criteria - Check docket to ensure strength and slump is as per design requirements
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.3]
Acceptance criteria - Finish true to line: The top and face of the finished kerb and channel.
○ Top surface: Uniform width, free from humps, sags and other irregularities.
○ Type: Steel float finish or as otherwise shown on drawings.
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.3]
Acceptance criteria - Contraction joints to conform to the following:
○ Intervals: every 3m for a min of 50% cross sectional area
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.3]
Acceptance criteria - Expansion joints to conform to the following:
○ To be provided where channel/gutter abuts against pits, retaining walls, overbridges and both sides of kerb laybacks unless otherwise shown on drawings.
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.4]
Acceptance criteria - Timing: Backfill behind kerb no earlier than 3 days after concreting.
○ Material: Granular material, free of organic material, clay and rock in excess of 50mm or approval material
○ Layers: Compact in layers not greater than150mm
○ 1 Working days before backfilling behind kerb
○ 3 Working days before to backfilling gutter pavement
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Ref docs - Spec. 1121 Open drain including K&C [Cl 4.0]
Acceptance criteria - Survey report verifying kerb and gutter has been constructed within tolerance:
○ Finish levels of channel/gutter surface: within ± 10mm of design level
○ Surface deviation of kerb face and channel surface: ±5 mm from edge of a 3m straight edge, except at laybacks, grade changes or curves, or at gully pits requiring channel/gutter depression.
3.2 - Acceptance and closure of non-conforming items
Acceptance criteria - NCRs to be opened for non-conforming items and closed prior to closing construction lot.
